name: World Long Forgotten
description:
Game is in the prototype phase, all prefabs used in this version will get updated later on.

WLF will be a a game about exploration, progression and fighting. You will be able to discover unknown regions of the continent not only in a horizontal space but also deep under the surface or high up in the air. Enemies you will face will be much stronger than you, but who says you can't beat them with good equipment and magic? Hand crafted world will reward your efforts with exotic equipment, spells and powers. You will earn even godlike abilities, but nothing what powerful comes without a risk and you're up to discover why such power is forbidden in World Long Forgotten.

Controls: 
Moving around: WSAD
Jumping: Space
Mega Jump: Left Control (prototype)
Zoom In/Out: Mouse Wheel
Debug Teleport: F1 - F5
